author: Phil
content:
Jean,

Kind weather on the open seas isn’t any fun.
It’s hard work when stormy and you’re glad you made it back, then you have something to talk about and laugh at it.

author: Jean-Pierre Declemy
content: Have a great day, I hope the weather is kind.

author: Phil
content:
August 4, 1790
Coast Guard Day is held every August 4 to commemorate the founding of the United States Coast Guard as the Revenue Marine on August 4, 1790, by then-Secretary of the Treasury Alexander Hamilton.

The Origins of Coast Guard Day
https://www.military.com/military-appreciation-month/origins-of-coast-guard-day.html
